CustomField.description: This is for Referral created to Ready for Intake field
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Referral_Created_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Ready_for_Intake_Date__c)) ), Ready_for_Intake_Date__c - Referral_Created_Date__c, NULL )
CustomField.label: Days-Referral Created to Intake Created
